DESCRIPTION: Warns a user on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}warn add @user reason** ~ Warns the mentioned user and adds the reason to the mod log.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: Place the bots role as high as possible to avoid missing permissions. That role has to be above the users highest role. Moderation has to be enabled in the guild settings.
TOO_LOW: Your highest role is not high enough to warn this member.
NEED_USER: You did not tell me which user to warn.
NEED_REASON: I need a reason with which to warn a user.
BOT_TOO_LOW: I do not have enough permissions to warn this user. My highest role is not high enough.
USER_TOO_LOW: You do not have a high enough role to warn this user.
TITLE: **{{user}}**, you have been warned in [**{{guildName}}**]
